name: Idea forHide and Seek Game
description: This is my first game to ever be made and it is more of an idea than an actual game. I am still figuring out my way around the application I am using. Please leave me feedback on if you would like this idea and I will get started working on it. I will try and update this at least once a week. Email me at halo4isepic9@gmail.com with any ideas or suggestions you have regarding this.
